server.name: io.github.maksimsarychau/mcp-zebrunner
server.description: Unified Zebrunner MCP server for TCM test cases, suites, coverage analysis, launchers, etc.

environmentVariables.description: Base URL for your Zebrunner instance (e.g., https://your-instance.zebrunner.com)
environmentVariables.name: ZEBRUNNER_URL

environmentVariables.description: Number of retry attempts for failed API requests (default: 3)
environmentVariables.name: RETRY_ATTEMPTS

environmentVariables.description: Delay between retry attempts in milliseconds (default: 1000)
environmentVariables.name: RETRY_DELAY

environmentVariables.description: Maximum page size for paginated API requests (default: 100, max: 1000)
environmentVariables.name: MAX_PAGE_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: Default page size for paginated API requests (default: 10)
environmentVariables.name: DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: Enable the rules engine for test case validation (default: auto-detected from mcp-zebrunner-rules.md file)
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_RULES_ENGINE

environmentVariables.description: Enable strict URL validation for security (default: true)
environmentVariables.name: STRICT_URL_VALIDATION

environmentVariables.description: Skip URL validation if it fails (less secure, more permissive) (default: false)
environmentVariables.name: SKIP_URL_VALIDATION_ON_ERROR

environmentVariables.description: Enable rate limiting for API calls (default: true)
environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_RATE_LIMITING

environmentVariables.description: Maximum API requests per second (default: 5, max: 100)
environmentVariables.name: MAX_REQUESTS_PER_SECOND

environmentVariables.description: Allow burst of API requests (default: 10, max: 200)
environmentVariables.name: RATE_LIMITING_BURST
